p: Among the 297 patients, nearly two thirds received oxygen inhalation, antibiotic therapy, traditional Chinese medicine and antiviral therapy (including lopinavir/ritonavir, arbidol and chloroquine phosphate). In addition, 66 (22.2 %) patients were treated with oseltamivir, 65 (21.9) with corticosteroids, and 35 (11.9 %) with immunoglobulin, respectively (Supplemental Table 1).
